+ Athan Pro is now lightning fast we have radically improved the startup launch time and the overall performances.

Salam waalykoum brothers & sisters:
This update is all about the new features introduced with iOS 12 and some improvements.

+ Siri shortcuts: Two shortcuts for Prayer times and for the next prayer. You can just say "Hey Siri, Prayer Times" a

+ Now you can view the past prayers in the dynamic wallpaper control.
+ Arabic support for the app store connect
+ Fix other minor bugs
+ Improve the performances.
+ Fix some minor bugs
